routines.title: Routines
routines.clickToCreateNewRoutine: Click + to create a new routine

hero.descriptionBefore: Manage your family, flatshare, or community with shared to-do lists, shopping lists, calendars, and more. Directly in the browser — completely

featuresSection.headline: Everything your household needs
featuresSection.description: From daily tasks to long-term planning — Together has all the tools to organize your household smoothly.
featuresSection.card1Description: Create and assign tasks to household members. Track progress and never forget important chores.
featuresSection.card2Description: Shared shopping lists synchronized in real-time. Add items, check them off, and never forget anything.
featuresSection.card3Description: Keep everyone updated with a shared calendar for appointments, events, and important dates.
featuresSection.card4Description: Keep track of shared expenses and outstanding amounts. Record debts, settle them, and maintain transparency.
featuresSection.card5Description: Organize not only your household but also flatshares, families, or clubs — all in one account. Switch effortlessly between communities.

whySection.title: Why Together?
whySection.description: Together makes household organization simple and accessible. No complicated software, no costs.
whySection.card1Description: No installation needed. Just open your browser and start immediately on any device.
whySection.card2Description: No hidden costs, subscriptions, or premium features. Everything is free forever.
whySection.card3Description: Intuitive interface that everyone understands instantly. No complicated setup required.

gettingStartedSection.title: Ready in Minutes
gettingStartedSection.description: Setting up your household is simple and intuitive. Start organizing today.
gettingStartedSection.step1Description: Create your free account in seconds — no credit card required.
gettingStartedSection.step2Description: Create your household, give it a name, and customize your space.
gettingStartedSection.step3Description: Invite family, flatmates, or community members via email or link.

ctaSection.headline: Ready to organize your household?
ctaSection.description: Together makes household organization simple and accessible. No complicated software, no costs.

footer.description: Brings households and communities together through better organization and communication. Free and open source.
